docs.snippet: Brazil will welcome the world to the summer Olympics with suspended President Dilma Rousseff still on trial for breaking budget rules, government sources said on Friday, despite the interim government's efforts to fast-track the process before the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil will welcome the world to the summer Olympics with suspended President Dilma Rousseff still on trial for breaking budget rules, government sources said on Friday, despite the interim government's efforts to fast-track the process before the Games.

headline.main: Rousseff's Trial to Run on During Summer Olympics in Brazil
headline.print_headline: Rousseff's Trial to Run on During Summer Olympics in Brazil
